Articles.Content:
What does it look like?

Like this:

No floating kerbals, now

The inside view looks like Marathon. I love it.

I totally need to hollow Ike out, fill it with MMM corridors and colonists, strap some engines on, and send it to Tau Ceti.

Edited May 26, 2013 by Nobody_1707

can anyone tell me if this works in the new 0.20 ???

thanks
The next release will, and it will be out very very soon.
Nice cant wait .....better practice getting to mun

http://somethingworthreading.org/Aww-Yeah-Meme-Rage-Face-On-a-T-Rex.jpg

Meme says its all Haha cant wait to! Need to make an comfortable new orbit station cheers!
any kinda eta on 0.20 compatibility? love this mod, use it in all planetary bases
0.20 compatibility will come with the new update, which will release as soon as I can contact Germalto about the last details, and one of the best feature of the update
awesome, glad to hear, love these parts, they make colony's so much more fun
I'm taking suggestions, too, so feel free to expose your ideas Also, post your screenshots if you have some, I'll use the best to decorate the post

I should be back in online sometime tonight, so expect a release either some time tonight or tommorrow

Teaser Pic :

Edited May 30, 2013 by germalto
looks awesome, will be lookin forward to seein the update
Updated! 0.30 is now uploaded and available for download! Enjoy!
I am unable to see the 4 way node in the editor. Everything else is great!

I am unable to see the 4 way node in the editor. Everything else is great!

Its an issue we're working on, stand by for a fix asap
Looking forward to it, I really like the aesthetic from the pics and want to get it installed when it's fully ready.
0.3.1 seems to be up on Spaceport http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/modular-magnetic-modules-buggy-alpha/
You should add a crew tank-esque module that fits in with the rest of the parts in the mod. It would make it easier to keep large amounts of kerbals on the base at once.

The issue with the central connector should now be fixed and is available in 0.3.1.

You should add a crew tank-esque module that fits in with the rest of the parts in the mod. It would make it easier to keep large amounts of kerbals on the base at once.

Kinda sorta got one on the go, things need to be re-done, the inside needs to be re-done and textures need to be added.
AWESOME, glad see this back, these are must have for great colonys
Mission Control

That mission control tower looks awesome so far. Really enjoying the updated parts, and looks like theres just more goodness to come!

Just a thought....some tanks in the same style would be awesome. Fuel+oxy and rcs for sure, a kethane tank would be super too, if possible.

Edited June 2, 2013 by KhaosCorp
Any chance you could make a video showing this mod off? How do you construct the base on another planet? And would love to see how you use some of the parts.

Any chance you could make a video showing this mod off? How do you construct the base on another planet? And would love to see how you use some of the parts.

the OP has a little vid of how it looks put together

also, haven't tested with the update, but in 0.19 I was actually landing sections verticaly and pulling them over with a KAS equipped rover...granted I only tried this on low-g planets/moons. Kinda pointless if theres an atmosphere since you can use parachutes or airship envelopes.

Edited June 2, 2013 by KhaosCorp
I think the airlock might be bugged as well, the attachment node is in the center of the model. Unless I'm confused on how to use it.

I think the airlock might be bugged as well, the attachment node is in the center of the model. Unless I'm confused on how to use it.

what airlock? there are 2 types
